channel.title: Help - SMR Forums
channel.description: Topics in the 'Help' category Having issues with the game or a mod?

item.title: How can I install mods manually?
item.dc:creator: @Aykut_Tasci Aykut Taşcı
item.description:
@Aykut_Tasci wrote:

https://docs.ficsit.app/satisfactory-modding/latest/ManualInstallDirections.html

Although I did everything right in the docs part, the SML installation occurred, but I could not activate the mods. Is there any other place where I need to install mods?

Is there anyone who can help me with this?

Posts: 6

Participants: 4

Read full topic
item.source: How can I install mods manually?

item.title: Game is Running, Cannot launch with SML Launched
item.dc:creator: @NemesisXKL2 Nemesis Xkl2
item.description:
@NemesisXKL2 wrote:

I dont know if that is a Bug or intended, I cannot run satisfactory from SML, after a while the Epic launch tells me ls0018 game is already running. It worked earlier for me, but now i always get this message.

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic
item.source: Game is Running, Cannot launch with SML Launched

item.title: Storage Teleporter
item.dc:creator: @S_H S H
item.description:
@S_H wrote:

I’m trying to set up the Storage Teleporter and I can’t seem to get them working. I have the teleporter station (powered), both teleporters have the same name, and the conveyor belts are in the correct positions. In the drop-down at the bottom of the details window, I selected the partner and saved but it hasn’t helped. When I reopen the details, it’s not paired anymore. What am I missing pls?
@Blockout22

Posts: 2

Participants: 2

Read full topic

item.title: Area Action Compatibility problem
item.dc:creator: @a1006771 A1006771
item.description:
@a1006771 wrote:

I am a Chinese player。
First of all, thank you very much for FICSIT platform and every mod producer。At the same time, I wish you good health。
My question is, when I uninstall Area Action, will the copied or filled buildings disappear?
I’m afraid my English is too poor for everyone to understand. I’ll say it again in Chinese。

我是一位中国玩家。
首先，非常感谢Ficsit平台和每一位mod制作者。同时我也祝愿你们身体健康。
我的问题是，当我卸载了Area Action这个mod以后，我所通过Area Action填充或者复制的建筑物会消失吗？

Posts: 1

Participants: 1

Read full topic

item.title: SML loading error
item.dc:creator: @Robert_Walters Robert Walters
item.description:
@Robert_Walters wrote:

I had an error loading the game. at first the log listed a mod DLL, (UtilityMod-0.6.0.dll) then the xinput1_3.dll SML file. so i removed the utility mod, thinking was the issue.

but i still get a xinput1_3.dll error that something is missing. i redownloaded and replaced the dll, but the same thing.

here is the log file. Suggestions?

[SML::Info] Attached SatisfactoryModLoader v1.0.2 to Satisfactory
[SML::Info] Finding config file…
[SML::Info] Validating system files…
[SML::Info] Sig file in place!
[SML::Warning] Skipping already disabled crash reporter
[SML::Info] Version check passed!
[SML::Info] Initialized SDK
[SML::Info] Looking for mods in: D:\epic\Epic Games\SatisfactoryEarlyAccess\FactoryGame\Binaries\Win64\mods
[SML::Error] Mod DLL D:\epic\Epic Games\SatisfactoryEarlyAccess\FactoryGame\Binaries\Win64\mods\xinput1_3.dll does not have the required information!
[SML::Info] Starting mod setup!
[CustomInventorySize::Info] Finished CustomInventorySize setup!

Posts: 6

Participants: 2

Read full topic

item.title: Farming Mod, batteries and Solar Panels
item.dc:creator: @iceman11a Iceman11a *
item.description:
@iceman11a wrote:

I wanted to ask, if removing a mod would hurt my world in anyway. I haven’t been able to find berries to unlock the farming to use the MK2 greenhouse. Just requires too much water. This should only require NON mod items and just use vanilla resources.

Is there any reason why this mod doesn’t load it. I haven’t unlocked Tier 7 yet. It doesn’t seem to load or unload.

Ice

Posts: 12

Participants: 2

Read full topic
